definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: The lunar calendar in March twenty-three, is the county seat of the ancient traditional, huge crowds of people on the street.
sentences.chinese: 农历三月二十三，是县城传统古会，大街上人山人海。

sentences.english: Flickering high- rise, boundless and indistinct sea of faces, where be the ground of my stay?
sentences.chinese: 幢幢高楼，茫茫人海，哪里是我的栖身之地？

sentences.english: In the boundless huge crowd, find the old familiar figure.
sentences.chinese: 在茫茫人海中，找着往日熟悉的背影。

sentences.english: So it's going to be very crowded and it's going to be very exciting.
sentences.chinese: 因此这里将会人山人海，而且会十分激动人心。

sentences.english: But in the vast world and wavy life I could not find such a person.
sentences.chinese: 但茫茫人海，漂泊人生，我始终没能寻到那个人。

sentences.english: Here there were large, specially designed lanterns made a wide range of design, novelty.
sentences.chinese: 这里人山人海，花灯种类繁多，设计新奇，造型各异。

sentences.english: Are there really enough odd-numbered rooms to accommodate the teeming horde of new guests?
sentences.chinese: 双号房间真能足够排下人山人海的新客人吗？

sentences.english: Out of the many people, I know you.
Apparition of these faces in the crowd. Petals on a wet, black, bough.
sentences.chinese: 人海中娇颜幽幽浮现，湿漉漉黑枝昙花片片。

sentences.english: Why can I always recognize him among the crowd?
sentences.chinese: 为什么我总能从人海茫茫中认出他来呢？

sentences.english: There were thousands of people inside and very crowed. People moved very slowly.
sentences.chinese: 超市里人山人海，摩肩接踵，人们移动地非常缓慢。

sentences.english: There are still lots of people, so was hard to move in the exhibition hall.
sentences.chinese: 展览会场人山人海，人要移动都很困难。

sentences.english: Looking for a serious long term relationship.
sentences.chinese: 人海茫茫，希望缘分将我和你联系在一起。

sentences.english: In the vast sea searching to find the year to save Xu Xian.
sentences.chinese: 她在茫茫人海中寻寻觅觅找到了当年救他的许仙。

sentences.english: Are we just sinking in an ocean of faces?
sentences.chinese: 我们是否只是在人海中载浮载沉的几张脸？

sentences.english: A sea of faces, walking as well as being apt , waits being holding the ticket smile.
sentences.chinese: 人山人海，边走边爱，拿着车票微笑等待。

definition: lit. rubbing shoulders and following in each other's footsteps/a thronging crowd
see 天涯海角[tian1 ya2 hai3 jiao3]
magnificent army with thousands of men and horses (idiom); impressive display of manpower/all the King's horses and all the King's men
the stream flows without stopping (idiom); unending flow
